chats.question: Description
chats.answer:
* Named Entity  
* Entity part of Entity Component System in game engine  
* It has string id and stores components of game object that i call Entity

chats.question: File Structure
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine_api/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs
|           |-- entity
|               |-- IEntity.ts
|               |-- IEntityWithComponents.ts
|               |-- IRenderable.ts
|               |-- IUpdatable.ts
```
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs
|           |-- entity
|               |-- Entity.ts
```

chats.question: Api
chats.answer:
```typescript
import IEntityWithComponents from './IEntityWithComponents'

export default interface IEntity extends IEntityWithComponents {
  id: string
}
```
```typescript
import { ClassType } from '../../tech/entity_component/ClassType'
import IComponent from '../../tech/entity_component/IComponent'
import IRenderable from './IRenderable'
import IUpdatable from './IUpdatable'

export default interface IEntityWithComponents extends IUpdatable, IRenderable {
  addComponent(component: IComponent): void
  addComponents(components: IComponent[]): void
  getComponentStrict<T extends IComponent>(
    componentType: ClassType<T>,
    id?: string
  ): T
  getComponent<T extends IComponent>(
    componentType: ClassType<T>,
    id?: string
  ): T | undefined
}
```
```typescript
export default interface IRenderable {
  render(deltaTime: number): void
}
```
```typescript
export default interface IUpdatable {
  update(deltaTime: number): void
}
```

chats.question: Entity
Description
chats.answer:
* Named Component  
* Component part of Entity Component System in game engine  
* This type defines data model and content of Entity

chats.question: File Structure
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine_api/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- component/
|               |-- ClassType.ts
|               |-- IComponent.ts
```
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- component/
|               |-- Component.ts
```

chats.question: Api
chats.answer:
```typescript
export type ClassType<T> = abstract new (...args: any[]) => T
```
```typescript
export default interface IComponent {
  update(deltaTime: number): void
  render(deltaTime: number): void
  get id(): string
  set id(id: string)
}
```

chats.question: LimitMove
InitLogicSystem
chats.answer:
* System part of Entity Component System in game engine  
* Api for specific type of system base 
* Preforms initialization tasks on registered entities  
* Used as base in initialization systems  
  invoked after entities are created from data   
  and need initialization and integration with engine

chats.question: File Structure
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- component/
|           |-- entity/
|           |-- system/
|               |-- base/
|                   |-- init_logic/
|                       |-- IInitLogicSystem.ts
|                       |-- IInitLogicSystemManager.ts
|                       |-- InitLogicSystemBase.ts
|                       |-- InitLogicSystemManager.ts
```

chats.question: IInitLogicSystem
IInitLogicSystemManager
chats.answer:
```typescript
import { IManager } from 'engine_api'
import IInitLogicSystem from './IInitLogicSystem'

export default interface IInitLogicSystemManager
  extends IManager<IInitLogicSystem> {
  init(): void
}
```
* Systems container api
